description.value:
Trigger determined by your catharsis emotion

Effect You gain the catharsis activation effects listed for your catharsis emotion. You gain that emotion's emotional fervor benefits for 3 rounds. When your emotional fervor ends, you suffer the listed emotional fallout. After using Catharsis, you can't use it again until you use the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Settle Emotions]{Settle Emotions} activity.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Emotional Fervor]{Effect: Emotional Fervor}
